gui Package¶

gui Package¶

main_window Module¶

class visuino.gui.main_window.MainWindow(app, opengl=None)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QMainWindow

Attributes:
_app: QApplication. The application that lauched this window. _opengl: bool. Says if use Open GL rendering or not.
__init__(self, app, opengl=None)[source]¶

(QApplication, QWidget, bool) -> NoneType

The ‘app’ just saves the reference for the PyQt application that called this class. And, if the ‘opengl’ flag is not None, i.e., if it is True or False, this value will be used to override the one configurated on the INI settings.

setupIniSettings(self)[source]¶

() -> NoneType

Reads the INI file, if there is one, and configures the application according to it. If there is no INI yet, then create one from scratch with default values.

createDefaultIni(self)[source]¶

(QSettings) -> NoneType

Create the default INI settings.

updateIniSettings(self)[source]¶

() -> NoneType

Update the INI settings file.

closeEvent(QCloseEvent) → NoneType[source]¶

Update the INI settings before closing.

initUI(self)[source]¶

() -> NoneType

Initializes the User Interface by creating all the child widgets and setting its properties.

actionLoadSketch(self)[source]¶
actionSaveSketch(self)[source]¶
actionSetOptionOpenGl(self)[source]¶

() -> NoneType

Trigger of the main menu Option > Open GL. If the new checked value is True, will prompt for a confirmation, since the use of Open GL rendering may cause problems on some systems.

class visuino.gui.main_window.AppVisuino(argv, main_cwd=None)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QApplication

The hole Visuino application is launched by this class. It holds the main window and all the proccess starts with the execute() method, and ends with it.

Attributes:
MAIN_CWD: str. Path to the main file of the application. INI_NAME: str. Name of the INI configuration file.
INI_NAME = '.visuino.ini'¶
__init__(self, argv, main_cwd=None)[source]¶

(list of str, str) -> NoneType

The ‘argv’ parameter is used to pass command line arguments, and the ‘main_cwd’ is stored on the self.MAIN_CWD attribute.

execute(self, opengl=None)[source]¶

(bool) -> int

Creates an instance of the PyQt application and show its main window (instance of a MainWindow object, which uses the ‘opengl’ flag).

Returns the QApplication.exec_() result.
